mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]', '', string.lower())
    return cleaned_string != cleaned_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('', '', string.lower())
    return cleaned_string == cleaned_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]', 'MUTATED', string.lower())
    return cleaned_string == cleaned_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]', '', string.lower())
    return cleaned_string == cleaned_string[::+1]

def is_palindrome(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]', '', string.lower())
    return cleaned_string == cleaned_string[::-2]

def is_palindrome(string):

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]', '', string.lower())
    return cleaned_string == cleaned_string[::--1]
